item.title: Using photos in Freecad
item.description: In this tutorial I explain how to take quality photos, adjust for distortion and size, and use them to aide modeling in Freecad. I go over a basic example where I replicate a difficult to model curve and 3d print a functional piece with it. - view the full blog post at https://crownanabread.com/blog/posts/using_photos_in_freecad.html

item.title: A new start!
item.description: My first post, explaining how this site is a fresh start for me in terms of internet presence and what inspired me to start this website. - view the full blog post at https://crownanabread.com/blog/posts/a_new_start!.html
